Struct._value: := ${Issue Type} || " - Work Order: " || ${Work Order} || " Issue To: " || ${Issue To}
:= test( ${Asset} is null or query("Assets","Asset","Asset=${Asset}") is not null, true, false)
:= test( ${Issue To} is null or query( "People", "Person", "Person = ${Issue To}" ) is not null, true, false )
:= test( ${Location} is null or query( "Locations", "Location", " Location = ${Location} " ) is not null, true, false )

test( ${Work Order} is null, !${MX_IN_FIELD_LIST(${REQUIRED_ISSUE_FIELDS}, "Work Order")}, query( "Work Order Lookup", "WorkOrderID", " 'Work Order' = ${Work Order} and 'Status' = 'APPR,INPRG,COMP,ASSIGNED' " ) )

FieldValidationStyle.Name: Work Order List by Issue To

EventAction.Condition: 0 and ${Issue To} is not null and !${IS_VALID_ISSUE_TO}

ConfigurationOption.Value: The specified Issue To is not valid
The specified Asset is not valid (${Asset})
The specified Location is not valid
This will delete ${CHILD_COUNT} child transaction(s) as well. Continue?

EventAction.Condition: ${Work Order} is null and ${Issue To} is null and ${Asset} is null and ${Location} is null

ConfigurationOption.Value: Please specify the charge details for the transactions

EventAction.Condition: ${Issue To} is not null and ${Work Order} is null and ${GL Account} is null

ConfigurationOption.Value: Please enter a valid GL account

EventAction.Condition: 0 and ${Work Order} is not null and !${MX_IS_OPEN_WORKORDER(${Work Order})}

ConfigurationOption.Value: Work Order is invalid or has an non-open status.
